website_summaries.verdict: These white strips stand out for their fast, long-lasting results, but they are expensive relative to other models.
pros: Good for sensitive teeth and whiten quickly — in as few as five days for some users
cons: Strips are on the short side, and may only go to the canine teeth of some users

customer_reviews.title: High priced especially if other lower priced whiteners work as well.
customer_reviews.text: The good part is they are comfortable and don't taste bad and you don't have to have it on for long. It's way more comfy than trays, which I hate. However, being that my teeth aren't super yellow at all, it's hard to judge how well it whitened my top teeth. I finished the 5-day, top teeth only. I do think it improved somewhat. Last night was the first for the bottom teeth. I have 4 more applications to go for the bottom. I'll know more after I'm done because my bottom teeth were more yellow than the top ones, so more change for marked improvement. However, the price is ridiculously high, I'm sorry to say!
customer_reviews.author: BreezyDays

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Really does a job. Leave mine in for 1.5 hrs. Use one strip on top and one on bottom to start. Then use on top only for next two times a few days apart. Then do the bottom once. There are not many in the box. Maybe four days using top and bottom, but they are not needed so much on the bottom as they will whiten so as not to notice a maybe one shade darker than the top. Wish the company could package a larger number per order in the box. Not overly priced, just need to be a bit smart about using to make them last.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use these whitestrips after all the positive reviews. I used them exactly as directed and left them on for two hours at a time. I don't notice any difference in the whiteness of my teeth :( ...
customer_reviews.author: Doodlelover

customer_reviews.title: Work great & same as the dentist sells
customer_reviews.text: Identical to the ones I bought at my dentist's office for twice the cost
customer_reviews.author: CherylAndy7

customer_reviews.title: Lumist did fine
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and made a noticeable difference. In response to my question, my dentist's assistant said that it would be fine to try a whitener but I may not be "a good candidate" for the process. She then added that it might make my teeth a shade or two lighter. This product made a difference. Not ready for Hollywood yet but good enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: Gaithersburg Gal

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Im a coffee and tea drinker and I was noticing my smile was not as bright as it used to be. With this product I saw a difference with the first use. My teeth are a very healthy natural white now..... not that fake white. I will use this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch and ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Several of the strips were stuck to the packaging and were unusable. After the first - and only - use my teeth hurt and ached horribly. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: PSD

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I saw results after two uses. Don't leave them on too long as they are gel and become hard to remove. Otherwise, great product. I definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Juline T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used this one and I can already see a slight difference! I'll update after:)
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Smile Tune-Up!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is good. These Lumist strips gave me a nice touch-up that my teeth needed for the price. I also liked the nice packaging they provide. About a year ago I used the crest whitestrips and they did a very good job but they were a bit painful to one tooth in particular, plus they are more pricey than what I paid for these. These lumist whitestrips strips were not painful at all. I did notice my teeth get a couple shades lighter. I bought these as a touch-up treatment and it worked for that. I fully recommend these lumist whitestrips.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I had found something that worked better than Crest Whitening strips but these weren’t it. Noticed no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Trent

customer_reviews.title: my teeth are super white now
customer_reviews.text: My yellow teeth have always caused me insecurity, so I got these to help me with it. Thankful for these; my teeth are super white now. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Chetti

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and really whitens!
customer_reviews.text: Like you can use and drink when the product is in place!
customer_reviews.author: valerie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it last for 6 months or more for the brightening
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put on ur teeth towards the end of strip and it doesn’t work that well for whitening the bottom of ur teeth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... day 2 of this system and so far so good. These are thick
customer_reviews.text: On day 2 of this system and so far so good. These are thick, quality strips that adhere well. I've used thinner strips before that don't stay on as well. I've also had intense sensitivity issues with previous whitening strips but these don't have any issues. One thing I didn't realize is that you have to keep these on for 1-2 hours each time. I am not a fan of the peroxide taste at all so while I have these on, I have to spit every 10-15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These whitening strips are three times better than other brands I've tried. It's fast-acting, and I don't feel any pain since I have sensitive teeth and gums. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: NO WHITENING.
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT DID NOT WORK AT ALL i used for all days for 2 hours per day no change in whiteness sorry... truth.
customer_reviews.author: BellaStregaFashions

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice whitening strips. They stay on great until you remove them. I think these are one of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my mom ^_^
customer_reviews.text: I bought these strips for my mom, who is a smoker since I was a kid, and she has dark yellow teeth. Now she smiles a lot to show her white teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Agata

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a definite difference! Easy to use - I did both bottom and top teeth at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Sandford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: stay in place. does not turn gums white but whitens your teeth well.
customer_reviews.author: CandyCane

customer_reviews.title: My smile looks gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for my teeth, and they look luminescent. My friends said that my smile looks gorgeous thanks to these teeth whitener.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wortless
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not notice one shade difference in the coloring if my teeth. Also have a stain that I'm working to remove and that wasn't phased at all. Wouldn't waste my money again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would try something else
customer_reviews.text: This product was meh....i didnt see much change at all and it made my teeth extra sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's the most effective whitener I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to whiten my lower teeth. I had beautiful veneers put on 2 yrs ago and, presently couldn't afford to do the lower teeth. I've tried many yet, this worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Best teeth whitening strips I have tried
customer_reviews.text: The results are awesome! They are strong and stay in place very well, and have a nice minty flavor. Will definitely buy again and recommend to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: JLH0609

customer_reviews.title: Work great!!
customer_reviews.text: These whitening strips work well & didn't cause any sensitivity issues. I will definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Liked better than other whitening strips
customer_reviews.text: Did the job as described. Liked better than other whitening strips. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: I used the product and followed directions as indicated. My teeth didn't get whiter. Not even a shade lighter.
customer_reviews.author: K.Dillard

customer_reviews.title: main peroxide ingredient believed to have caused diarrhea.
customer_reviews.text: Our healthy 16 year old daughter used Lumist strips for 3 days. Each day she mentioned slight nausea after wearing strips for 1.5 hours. Third day,by 6a.m. watery diarrhea. Strips appeared to have started to work, nothing dramatic and unless you knew her teeth you wouldn't have noticed any whitening after 3 days. Stopped using the strips and returned to 100% health later that day. Googled carbomide peroxide, the main ingredient in these strips and it "can cause diarrhea and vomiting. Use caution when using this ingredient. Assuming this reaction was an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: beckytalk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to apply and no gum irritation. Whitens as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You see the difference on first day
customer_reviews.text: This whitener is awesome and you cant beat the price
customer_reviews.author: memphisgirl

customer_reviews.title: These truly get your teeth white!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved this product. My teeth get sooo damn white. I will forever be a fan of this teeth whitening kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but did not like the sweet taste during using the product
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well, but did not like the sweet taste during using the product. It was way too sweet. Can't order again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Marien

customer_reviews.title: Whitening
customer_reviews.text: It’s was crap iv use all kinda stripes this brand no good
customer_reviews.author: Eppelina Forrest

customer_reviews.title: ... to your teeth really well and doesn't slide off like others.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt notice a big difference but it sticks to your teeth really well and doesn't slide off like others.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis K. Best

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as instructed, and I never saw a noticeable change.
customer_reviews.author: Daid Gansauer

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: some don't stay on your teeth, did not saw results
customer_reviews.author: hunt

customer_reviews.title: Aces
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at lightening a few shades, but did cause sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: M.the.G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and I could see whitening from the beginning. I will use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: William T Downes

customer_reviews.title: However I don't do them every day as recommended. I usually put 2 days between each whitening ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a teeth whitening system for a long time. I have extremely sensitive teeth and even the so called "sensitive" brands hurt me or they make no difference! These strips however are very effective and have given me no discomfort! I can leave them on for the full two hours! However I don't do them every day as recommended. I usually put 2 days between each whitening to be safe. My teeth were shades whiter after just 3 uses and look amazing after 5! I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are the best bang for the buck ! First. they stay on , and they work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a better brightness. Not sure if I notice a big change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit, hate the flavor. Really adheres to teeth. Will buy again. Didn't like being harassed to leave a review. Was asked 3x... that is bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky in Ca

customer_reviews.title: Gets you results!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty effective! After maybe a use or two, you can see a difference. I suggest keeping it on for an hour and a half. There is definitely a minty taste to it. My teeth don't hurt or anything unlike others that may sensitize your teeth. Only issues that I can see is that the strip is quite short, it only goes a bit past your canines. So your molars won't be changing. And the other issue would be that you can tell there's a film over your teeth. Doing this at home after school/work would be the smartest thing to do or on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are a hidden treasure. My husband I both use them and their awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Best ever whitener
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this is the BEST teeth whitening I have ever used. I've tried over the counter and in office for hundreds of dollars. Lumist is far better than any including the in office. The price is also less than any I have used. I would recommend this product and will definitely order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging as not described!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my whitening system and the box does not match the description! No neat box with mirror, just a regular box.. with 10 strips in it. I was excited to have the packaging as described..
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the product because the strips stuck to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the product because the strips stuck to the packaging and wasn't able to get the strip out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bryan

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It does not work . After using all strips ( in proper way ) I have not noticed any difference. My first review was not posted , little suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Wiktoria

customer_reviews.title: 2 times it has shipped faulty products. They can't manufacture these correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this twice and returned it twice BECAUSE THE STRIPS COME IN THE PACKAGE completely USELESS because of a mistake in manufacturing. The gel that is supposed to be on the strip is always just lumped in the corner of the sealed box, rendering the strips themselves completely useless, without any whitening gel! They just can't manufacture these to be right. I gave them two tries.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Combs

customer_reviews.title: Better for sensitive gums!
customer_reviews.text: I think these whitened my teeth at least a bit. I normally cannot use any whitening b/c my gums are so extremely sensitive but I was able to use these!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results. After each application was removed, my teeth were noticeable a shade whiter. Impressive and something I will order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous spender

customer_reviews.title: Great whitening, done sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: These were cheaper than the crest white strips and looked good in the reviews so I gave it a try. They really did work well, with a notice difference after the first strips. I did 3 days straight then took a few day break and did one more step and got the shade I wanted, so I'll save the last two for touch up. I have for starts because I did get done sensitivity for a few days. Still bearable and I will probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Little Otter

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The box showed this product was already expired. I was informed it was not eligible for return. The product is not useable. The whitening product sticks to the film and is all dried out. What a waste of money and terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I have tried crest strips with so much pain I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried crest strips with so much pain I had to stop. This product sticks to your teeth so well you can drink with them in without a weird taste in your mouth or any pain! I had noticeable results after even the first application.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I've tried so many whitening products throughout years and these are the best. My teeth are so sensitive so I can't leave other strips on very long but I can leave these on for two hours and have no sensitivity plus my teeth are visibly whiter after just one use. This is my second time buying these and I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Kosek

customer_reviews.title: LUMIST White Strips
customer_reviews.text: These white strips are not easy to use; very difficult to get them secured on my teeth. And even harder to remove; they stick & have to be pulled off in pieces. Was very disappointed. I will use the whole box in hopes I will see whiter teeth.
customer_reviews.author: MWilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used these in the past. Lightens teeth staining without the sensitivity!
customer_reviews.author: Denisek

customer_reviews.title: Best whitening strips I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Lumist not only does the best job whitening my teeth, but for the first time here is a product that does not shift or completely come off the teeth. Lumist stays in place and does a great job whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Only for the top row of your teeth
customer_reviews.text: You only get the strip for top row of teeth. If I had known that its only for top set would have selected a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: missy8a

customer_reviews.title: Work well and cost much less than many other brands
customer_reviews.text: These strips work very well and whiten teeth in much less time than some other brands. They also cost much less, so I'm very pleased. The strips were easy to apply, and I didn't experience any sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: ASM

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Best strips I have ever used. You will notice a difference after the first time
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed that there were not more applications for $20
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that there were not more applications for $20.00. They recommend leaving them on for 2 hours but I couldn't do that because I have sensitive teeth and they began to hurt. They did whiten my teeth though but not to the level I want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy or recommend this product to Anyone
customer_reviews.text: Followed sellers instructions on use and did not see a change.Would never buy or recommend this product to Anyone.Very disappointed,and unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made splotchy
customer_reviews.text: This product did not whiten evenly. Overall it would be a good product if it would whiten properly. If you have a good whitening strip, DONT Switch
customer_reviews.author: Splat!

customer_reviews.title: Best Teeth Whitening Product I've ever used and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Teeth Whitening Product I've ever used and I have used them all! In two days my teeth were whiter and very comfortable to wear. I'm hooked!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good, but the ease of use is the best I have ever tried!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: works better then other whiteners i have tried and even seems to not leave my gums as sensitive. only draw back is its for the top only but i just cut them in half and use for both
customer_reviews.author: Zara Amtom

customer_reviews.title: Great teeth whitener
customer_reviews.text: Best whitening strips that I have found on the market. A week of using the strips really makes a difference in the appearance of your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Ida McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see much difference in the shade on my teeth. Not recommended

customer_reviews.title: Good results!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I noticed a difference after the second treatment!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can't get this to stick to my teeth!!! Trying to figure out why!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: ... again though stuck to my molars and did not like any better than Crest white
customer_reviews.text: Product ok - I won't order again though stuck to my molars and did not like any better than Crest white strips
customer_reviews.author: Rita Harman

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to apply and remove and have a nice minty ...
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to apply and remove and have a nice minty taste. I noticed a difference in my teeth's brightness after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Grant

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective item and manufacturer did not respond to my multiple emails. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: HPN ACK CDG

customer_reviews.title: not so great because..
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it much. stuck to my teeth when I went to peel it off, even though i followed directions. poor product period. plus there is an artificial sweetener in it for some reason. i prefer crest after giving this a try. It's pretty gewy.
customer_reviews.author: Nate S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Too thick and heavy are the strips. Didn't know they have to be on for one-two hours, too long fir my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Nickey

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Bit pricey. Ten in a package, not ten sets. Did not work any better than either Crest or generic brands.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Street

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use. It's not clear which side of strip goes on your teeth. Very sticky to handle. Misleading because you think you're getting 10 treatments but only one strip per pack so you only get 5 treatments. This stuff has to stay on for 2 hours. I definitely say stay away from this brand. No noticeable improvement after all that hassle.
customer_reviews.author: jannyjan53

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price !
customer_reviews.text: This item seem to make my teeth about 30 percent whiter with one kit, I didn't care for the taste and some light burning sensation around my gum area but it was easy to use and with this formable soft sticky rubbber texture covers about 90 percent the tooth area, recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: B. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Crest white strips are way better. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice a difference at all. Crest white strips are way better. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not shorten my teeth; I left it on for 2 hours each day for 5 days as prescribed; no change. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Kelley

product_meta.title: Lumist New Advanced Next Generation Teeth Whitening Strips Non-Slip Comfort Fit Technology, – WHITENS UP TO 5 SHADES IN 5 DAYS or Less - Removes Coffee, Tea, Tobacco & Wine Stains (10 Strips)
feature_bullets: WHITENS YOUR TEETH UP TO 5 SHADES IN JUST 5 DAYS - No more waiting weeks to whiten your teeth with our gentle protective enamel safe formula.

ILLUMINATE YOUR SMILE IN JUST 5 TREATMENTS WITHOUT THE DENTIST - NEW ADVANCED NEXT GENERATION teeth whitening strips with Non-Slip Comfort Fit Technology that securely applies to your top & bottom rows of teeth. Whitening your teeth in just days.
ONLY 10 WHITENING STRIPS WILL DO THE TRICK - Includes: 10 Pack Strips. Use them for either the top, bottom or both. Lumist Advanced Teeth Whitening Strips whitens in DAYS, not weeks, to see results.

3X FASTER THAN OTHER BRANDS - JUST 1-2 HOURS A DAY FOR 5 DAYS - That’s it. 1) Remove from tray 2) Press to top/bottom surface against teeth 3) Fold under . 4) Leave on 1-2 hours. 5) Remove 6) Brush. Its that EASY.

HIGH CONCENTRATION OF WHITENING INGREDIENT WITH UP TO ZERO SENSITIVITY - Lumist uses a special formula blend and whitening ingredient (20%) carbamide peroxide, which is more gentle than hydrogen peroxide or bleach, allowing faster teeth whitening in DAYS. New Advanced Next Generation in Teeth Whitening Strips Technology.
